overview_of_class: This non-calculus based course covers topics in Electricity and Magnetism: charges, electric and magnetic forces, electrical [potentials, batteries, circuits with both D.C. and A.C. currents, capacitance, induction and inductance, and finally electromagnetic radiation.  Actual demonstrations of many physical principles will be shown in the lecture when ever possible. Weekly homework assignments emphasize problem solving.
name: College Physics II
subject: PHYSICS
